alert.note: Alert for George; Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 23 at 1:22PM CDT until August 24 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR STONE...GEORGE...AND PERRY COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI TODAY AND ON THURSDSAY GIVEN THE COMBINATION OF HIGH KBDI VALUES AND SIGNIFICANT DROUGHT CONDITIONS... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STONE, GEORGE, AND PERRY COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM CDT THURSDAY FOR STONE, GEORGE, AND PERRY COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 10 AM to 8 PM CDT Thursday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 075, 078 and 079. * WINDS...Southeast 5 to 10 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
